text: Martin Eugene Mull (August 18, 1943 - June 27, 2024) was an American comedian, painter, recording artist, and movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He appeared in animated shows including American Dad!. He played Russell the pharmacist in Two and a Half Men. He voiced Vlad Master in Danny Phantom. Mull was raised in North Ridgeville, Ohio and in New Canaan, Connecticut. Mull married his wife Wendy in 1982. He had a daughter, Maggie. Mull died on June 27, 2024, at the age of 80, in Los Angeles from pancreatic cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * *NNDB page for Martin Mull Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American painters Category:American guitarists Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Ohio Category:Actors from Rhode Island Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:Singers from Connecticut Category:Singers from Rhode Island Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Singers from Ohio Category:Musicians from Connecticut Category:Musicians from Rhode Island Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Musicians from Ohio Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:People from New Canaan, Connecticut Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Martin Mull
